title: The Witcher 3 : GOTY (v1.31 + All DLC's) [FitGirl]
description:
Release Date: May 18, 2015 ~ August 30, 2016
Genres/Tags: RPG, Open world, Third-person, 3D
Developer: CD Projekt RED
Publisher: CD Projekt RED
Platform: PC [Repack]
Engine: REDengine 3
Steam User Rating: 96% of user reviews are positive (based on 49,594 reviews)

Minimum requirements:
Operating System: 64-bit Windows 7 or 64-bit Windows 8 (8.1)
Processor: Intel CPU Core i5-2500K 3.3GHz / AMD CPU Phenom II X4 940
RAM: 6 GB
Video Card: Nvidia GPU GeForce GTX 660 / AMD GPU Radeon HD 7870
DirectX: 11
HDD Space: 36~53 GB - read below why

Included DLCs & Expansions :

Beard and Hair Style Set (Found at any Barber)
Temerian Armor Set (White Orchard, Merchant close by the Woesong Bridge Signpost)
Alternative Look for Yennefer
New Quest "Contract: Missing Miners" (Found in Skellige on a notice board)
Elite Crossbow Set
"Ballad Heroes" Neutral Gwent Card Set
Nilfgaardian Armor Set (Quartermaster in Crows Perch other side of the Master Blacksmith)
New Quest "Fool's Gold" (Found by speaking to bandits at Lurtch in Velen)
Alternative Look for Triss
Skellige Armor Set (Sold by the Smith in Kaer Trolde)
New Quest "Scavenger Hunt: Wolf School Gear"
New Quest "Contract: Skellige's Most Wanted"
New Quest "Where The Cat and Wolf Play" (Begins in Oreton, Velen)
Alternative Look for Ciri
New Finisher Animations
New Game +
Hearts of Stone Expansion Pack
Blood & Wine Expansion Pack


Repack Features :

Based on The.Witcher.3.Wild.Hunt.Game.of.the.Year.Edition.v1.31-GOG non-scene release: 33.1 GB
Additonal voicepacks added: 15.3 GB
All GUI/subtitles translation left intact
NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
Voiceovers language packs as optional downloads - you can combine them in the game options with any text translation
100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
Ready for official GOG patches, registy entries recreated (open "Registry Fixreadme.txt" after game installation if registry entries weren't created in your case)
Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from cumulative 48.4 GB to 23.5~38.5 GB, depending on language packs)
Installation takes: 1 hour on 8-cores CPU + SSD; ~1.5-2 hours on 4-cores CPU + HDD; up to 3 hours on 2-cores CPU + HDD. Avoid any load on your target HDD during installation! Turn off torrent client or similar software.
HDD space after installation: 36~53 GB (depending on selected language packs)
Repack by FitGirl
